title: High Elf

Acid Splash: Hurl a bubble of acid that deals 1d6 Acid to each creature it hits. Blade Ward: Gain resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage from weapon attacks. Bone Chill: Assail a creature with the chill of the grave. It takes 1d8 Necrotic and cannot regain hit points.Dancing Lights: Create wisps of light that illuminate a 9m radius. Fire Bolt: Hurl a mote of fire that deals 1d6 Fire and creates a flammable surface. Friends: Enchant a
